comments:
I200411022000, Motif, Solaris.

I tried opening several external files.  The first couple did not open, and did
not display an error dialog.  The following was printed to the console (but not
to the log):

As the exception states, you can't create an IFile on a path with onely one
segment. Moving to platform text.

Also happens under WinXP.

This is a bug in Search: it calls IContainer.getFile(IPath) which specs that the 
path must have at least 2 segments.

The problem is provisorily fixed and released into I200411040800. The correct
fix needs to be put in place for 3.1 M4 (see bug 77807).

traces.message: Path must include project and resource name: /.mailcap
Path must include project and resource name: /.bash_history
